publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1955 Margaret Jamieson: Congratulations to Staff at HM Prison Kilmarnock—That the Parliament congratulates all staff at HM Prison Kilmarnock on being awarded the British Safety Council Sword of Honour at the first attempt, demonstrating the commitment of the staff in delivering a safe working environment.

S2M-1955 Margaret Jamieson: Congratulations to Staff at HM Prison Kilmarnock—That the Parliament congratulates all staff at HM Prison Kilmarnock on being awarded the British Safety Council Sword of Honour at the first attempt, demonstrating the commitment of the staff in delivering a safe working environment.
